title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1750.17 - Application of amended provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1750.17 - Application of amended provisions

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part, as amended, shall apply top
any pending or future dissolution proceeding; provided, however, that where a
housing company has taken certain acts prior to the effective date of the
amended provisions, the provisions of this Part in effect at the time the acts
were taken shall apply with respect to those acts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1750.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
